mapper.select: select tr.*, m.m_name from trip_reply tr, member m where tr.m_num=m.m_num and t_num = #{t_num} order by tre_ref, tre_re_step, tre_num
select nvl(max(tre_re_step), 0) + 1 from trip_reply where tre_ref = #{tre_ref}
mapper.update: update trip_reply set tre_re_step = tre_re_step + 1 where tre_ref=#{tre_ref} and tre_re_step > #{tre_re_step}
update trip_reply set del='y' where tre_num=#{tre_num}
update trip_reply set tre_content=#{tre_content} where tre_num=#{tre_num}
mapper.insert: insert into alert (ale_num, t_num, t_title, t_reply, m_num) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(ale_num),0)+1 FROM alert), #{t_num},#{t_title},1,#{m_num})
mapper.select: select ale_num, m_num, sch_num, sch_name, s_date-sysdate+1 as day, temp_num, temp_name, temp_crud, place_num, del, cs_num, cs_title, t_num, t_title, t_like, t_reply from alert where m_num=#{m_num} and s_date-sysdate+1 < 8
